channel.title: Digitized Ceramics Books
channel.description:
## Pottery Techniques
[THE POTTER'S CRAFT](http://archive.org/details/potterscraftprac00binnuoft) A Practical Guide for the Studio and Workshop BY CHARLES F. BINNS NEW YORK; D. VAN NOSTRAND COMPANY, INC. , 1910
[THE MANUAL OF PRACTICAL POTTING](http://archive.org/details/manualofpractica00binnuoft) SPECIALLY COMPILED BY EXPERTS AND EDITED BY CHARLES F. BINNS LONDON; SCOTT, GREENWOOD & SON, 1922 "THE POTTERY GAZETTE AND GLASS TRADE REVIEW" OFFICES
[THE CLAYWORKER'S HAND-BOOK](http://archive.org/details/clayworkershandb00searrich) A MANUAL FOR ALL ENGAGED IN THE MANUFACTURE OF ARTICLES FROM CLAY BY ALFRED B. SEARLE LONDON: CHARLES GRIFFIN & COMPANY, LIMITED,; 1921
[POTTERY - A HAND-BOOK OF PRACTICAL POTTERY FOR ART TEACHERS AND STUDENTS](http://archive.org/details/potteryhandbooko02lunniala) BY RICHARD LUNN VOLUME II - DECORATION OF POTTERY LONDON; CHAPMAN AND HALL, LTD.; 1910
[POTTERY FOR ARTISTS, CRAFTSMEN AND TEACHERS](http://archive.org/details/potteryforartist00coxgrich) BY GEORGE J. COX INSTRUCTOR IN POTTERY AND MODELLING AT TEACHERS COLLEGE - COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY NEW YORK; THE MACMILLAN COMPANY; 1914
[HOW TO MAKE POTTERY](http://archive.org/details/howtomakepottery00whit) BY MARY WHITE NEW YORK; DOUBLEDAY, PAGE & COMPANY; 1904
[THE CHEMISTRY OF POTTERY](http://archive.org/details/chemistryofpotte00langrich) BY KARL LANGENBECK EASTON, PA.: CHEMICAL PUBLISHING CO.; 1895.
[A HANDBOOK TO THE PRACTICE OF POTTERY PAINTING](http://archive.org/details/cu31924031306578) BY JOHN C. L. SPARKES HEAD MASTER OF THE NATIONAL ART TRAINING SCHOOL LONDON; LECHERTIER, BARBE, & CO.; 1879
## Glazes [Chinese Stoneware Glazes](https://archive.org/details/chinesestoneware00greb) Joseph Grebanier New York; Watson-Guptill Publications; 1975
[Copper Red Glazes](https://archive.org/details/copperredglazes00tich) Robert Tichane Krause Publications, 1998
[Glazes for the Potter](https://archive.org/details/glazesforpotter00coop) Emmanuel Cooper and Derek Royle New York; Scribner; 1978
## Japanese Pottery [Karatsu Pottery](https://archive.org/details/karatsu008800)
[The potter's brush : the Kenzan style in Japanese ceramics](https://archive.org/details/pottersbrushkenz00wils ) by Wilson, Richard L., 1949-; Ogasawara, Saeko, 1943-; Freer Gallery of Art
## Kiln Building [Anagama: Building Kilns and Firing](http://www.anagama-west.com/anagama/book/anagama_translation.php) English translation of the Japanese book by Furutani Michio. Does not include most of the pictures and diagrams in the original. Translated by Shiori Noro, and edited by Dick Lehman and Odin Maxwell.

item.description:
There are several copies of Rhodes’ Clay and Glazes for the Potter on archive.org. This one can be downloaded, but I’m not sure if it’s still under copyright. According to this post, it’s possible the copyright has expired, since it was published in 1957. If it’s still under copyright, we could link to the others on archive.org.
